name: Freezeframe (itch)
description:
please fill this in after playing <3

General feedback form: https://forms.office.com/r/WcDftqweE0

 Feature testing form: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=ZWdrxpS3K0qE7YRbNBwIarzUfT1WNGVAhepPrDM8YOpUMEwzVFVUSFJSVEVKN1Y1WUg2RUM5SDZGRC4u

You wake up in an abandoned building. All you have is a  thermal camera and your work ID that  has your picture, your name, and details about your position within the building inspection company that you work for. You don’t know how you got here, but you were probably inspecting the building. All you can hear is your heartbeat and  breathing. It’s time to ESCAPE!

Made by:
